description: A vegan Potato Salad just the way you remembered it. Soft red skin potatoes mixed with fresh vegetables and herbs and tossed in a creamy zesty dressing for the perfect summer potluck dish.
name: Vegan Potato Salad
recipeIngredient: 4 medium red skin potatoes, (cut into 3/4" pieces)

recipeInstructions.text: Bring a large stockpot of water to boil and add the cubed potatoes. Boil the potatoes for 8-10 minutes, until a fork can easily pierce through the potato pieces. Once tender, strain them through a colander, rinse them in cool water to stop the cooking, and place them in the refrigerator to let them cool.
While potatoes are cooling, dice the vegetables and herbs. Once potatoes are cool, transfer to a large salad bowl. Mix in vegetables and herbs.

In a small bowl combine vegan mayonnaise, dijon mustard, white wine vinegar, and salt. Once combined, toss with the mayonnaise-based dressing until evenly coated. Refrigerate for at least 30 minutes to let the flavors marinate. Keep in the refrigerator until ready to serve.
